head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CUMMINGS, THOMAS J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CUMMINGS, THOMAS J.

block.p: CUMMINGS-Thomas J. On November 3, 2000. Beloved husband of the late Mary Therese. Devoted father of Roberta, Thomas Jr., Mary Austin, Joseph, Therese Graham and Dorothy. Father-in-Law of Diane Cummings and John Graham. Loving grandfather of Thomas, Edward, Jennifer, Chantel, Michael, Samantha and Linda. Great grandfather of 5. Dear brother of Alice Shine. Funeral Monday, 9:30 AM from the Mc Manus Funeral Home, 2001 Flatbush Ave, Brooklyn. Funeral Mass 10:30 AM. St. Francis of Assisi, RC Church, Interment Calverton National Cemetery. Visiting Saturday and Sunday, 2-5, 7-9 PM.
